name: AntenaOne
0:
”Alexa, open Antena One”
”Alexa, ask Antena One to play”
”Alexa, ask Antena One what music is currently playing”
skdetail:
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: antena one
des:
Listen to Antena One, the number one in music.

Antena One provides a high quality sound 24/7 with the best music.

Note: The content of this skill is mostly in Portuguese with the song lyrics being mostly in English.

To start, just say "Alexa, launch Antena One" or "Alexa, play Antena One" to start the radio.

At anytime, you can stop the radio by saying "Alexa, stop".

Say "Alexa, ask Antena One who is this?" to know the currently playing music.

Did you know that you can wake up every morning while listening to Antena 1? Just add the skill to your morning routine!

To add the skill to a new Routine, follow the steps:
1. In the Alexa App, go to Routines.
2. Click on + to add a new Routine.
3. Click on + to "When this happens" and choose one.
4. Click on + to "Add Aktion" and chosse "Skills".
5. Choose "Your Skills" > Select Antena One.
6. Choose a device to execute the the Routine > SAVE.
priv: The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
